quizDescription.text:
Note: Write your correct options with comma and space separated
  • Ex1: a, b
  • Ex2: c
  • Ex3: a, c, d
  • Correct Options must me in ascending order
  • Some answers contains true or false, please write true or false in blank.

questionText.text:
Which language is used to create relations
a. DML
b. DDL
c. DCL
d. DQL
Suppose relation R(A,B,C) and relation S(A,B,C) has the following tuples:

Compute the union of R and S. Which of the following tuples DOES NOT appear in the result?
a. (2, 2, 3)
b. (1, 2, 3)
c. (4, 5, 6)
d. (2, 5, 6)
When using distinct keyword on a column, it include NULL values that are present in that column  (true/false).

Not equals operator is represented in Postgresql as ____________
a. <>
b. ~
c. !=
d. Not equals

Structural description of relations in database is called as
a. Schema
b. Tuples
c. Attributes.
d. None of the above.
